description: Through blockchain underlying technology and smart contracts, Hardcore is aimed at building a global measurement platform for value asset and virtual asset value. As the only pass issued on the platform, HD is used for the construction of the entire ecosystem, pledge, voting, dividends, auctions, etc. HD's total distribution is 10 billion. With smart contracts, each chain transfer automatically destroys 10% of the transfer amount until it is destroyed to 100 million pieces. The clever design of the deflation model makes the community consensus and ecological construction always higher than the speed of token issuance, which achieves a comprehensive transcendence from the underlying technology to the token model to the ecological layout.
name: HARDCORE
